label: A3B2C2D4_tI22_139_ae_e_e_g-001
title: Ca$_{3}$Cu$_{2}$O$_{4}$Cl$_{2}$
comments:
Although the prototype compound is a Mott Insulator (Li, 2022), (Ca,Sr)$_{3}$Cu$_{2}$O$_{4}$Cl$_{2}$ is an 80K superconductor. 
 Although (Huang, 1990) set the lattice constant $a$ = 3.861{\AA} for Ca$_{3}$Cu$_{2}$O$_{4}$Cl$_{2}$, Table III of that paper suggests that the actual value is 3.8609{\AA}.
